name: Lady in a Leotard With a Gun
name_original: Lady in a Leotard With a Gun
description:
Short third person shooter where you shoot all the enemies and go to the exit

controls 

Move with WASD or left analogue stick

Jump with space or on a xbox controller button a or right bumper

Dodge roll with left shift or on a controller button b or left bumper

Crouch with C or on a controller button x
